best_gem_comment: Take this class!! It is by far one of my favorite classes at Harvard so far. It was interesting to learn about scientists that have shaped the world of Molecular Biology. Professor Loscik is a gem and a wonderful lecturer! He instils in you a passion for the topic and "his story time" moments had me laughing constantly. It is a very well–taught class and I loved taking it.
best_gem_comment_short: Professor Loscik is a gem and a wonderful lecturer!

best_gem_comment: Take the class!!! It's honestly SUCH a gem. The content is super interesting, the psets aren't too bad (and you can do them at Sunday Problem Set Solving hours with TFs), and the staff are all so supportive.
